name: Bruno Giacomelli
introduction: Bruno Giacomelli (born 10 September 1952 in Poncarale, Brescia, Lombardy, Italy) is a retired racing driver from Italy.  Dbuting at the 1977 Italian Grand Prix, Giacomelli drove eight seasons of Formula One from 1977 to 1990, driving for McLaren, AlfaRomeo, Toleman and Life.  He scored one pole position and took one podium.
